Articles.Content:
I'm in the 3rd tutorial. Brick wall. 

I'm supposed to put 4 fins on by toggling symmetry to 4x. When i click the symmetry button, or x, i get the options of single, or double. What could i possibly be doing wrong...

2 minutes ago, iceicespace said:

I'm in the 3rd tutorial. Brick wall. 

I'm supposed to put 4 fins on by toggling symmetry to 4x. When i click the symmetry button, or x, i get the options of single, or double. What could i possibly be doing wrong... 

You are in mirror mode. Press R to go back to Symmetry mode
See, i knew i am simply not the brightest. Thanks for the quick answer. Cheers.
